article.headline: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Cl A stock rises Wednesday, still underperforms market
article.body: Shares of Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Cl A BRK.A, +0.06% advanced 1.34% to $319,571.00 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% rising 1.74% to 3,419.44 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% rising 1.91% to 28,303.46. Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Cl A closed $27,829.00 short of its 52-week high ($347,400.00), which the company achieved on January 17th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Wednesday, as Honeywell International Inc. HON, +0.34% rose 2.79% to $171.55, 3M Co. MMM, +0.94% rose 2.63% to $166.49, and General Electric Co. GE, +2.85% rose 2.27% to $6.31. Trading volume (210) remained 183 below its 50-day average volume of 393.
